entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Temperature steady near minus 3. Forecast issued 5:58 PM PST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
